description: Describes the specified local gateway virtual interface groups.

parameters.name: LocalGatewayVirtualInterfaceGroupIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the virtual interface groups. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: One or more filters. local-gateway-id - The ID of a local gateway. local-gateway-virtual-interface-group-id - The ID of the virtual interface group. local-gateway-virtual-interface-id - The ID of the virtual interface. owner-id - The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the local gateway virtual interface group. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: LocalGatewayVirtualInterfaceGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the virtual interface group.

nested_items.name: LocalGatewayVirtualInterfaceIds
nested_items.description: The IDs of the virtual interfaces.

nested_items.name: LocalGatewayId
nested_items.description: The ID of the local gateway.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the local gateway virtual interface group.

nested_items.name: LocalBgpAsn
nested_items.description: The Autonomous System Number(ASN) for the local Border Gateway Protocol (BGP).

nested_items.name: LocalBgpAsnExtended
nested_items.description: The extended 32-bit ASN for the local BGP configuration.

nested_items.name: LocalGatewayVirtualInterfaceGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the local gateway virtual interface group.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags assigned to the virtual interface group.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationState
nested_items.description: The current state of the local gateway virtual interface group.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
